author:
Compiled by Tony Hicks

thicks@bayareanewsgroup.com
title: Watch: Stars flock to 'Hail Caesar'
text:
Watch: Stars flock to 'Hail Caesar' Compiled by Tony Hicks Posted: 10/09/2015 10:42:05 AM PDT Updated: 10/09/2015 10:50:13 AM PDT The Coen Brothers have released the first trailer for "Hail Caesar!" and, not only does it look great, but it seems to star everyone in Hollywood. 
Josh Brolin, George Clooney, Channing Tatum, Scarlett Johansson, Jonah Hill, Ralph Fiennes, Tilda Swinton, Frances McDormand and ... a lot of other people. 
The film takes place during Hollywood's golden era. Clooney's character is a serious A-list actor who gets mysteriously kidnapped by "The Future" while making a big budget Roman gladiator movie. 
This is where you go to YouTube to watch Peter Graves ask Joey if like those gladiator movies. 
"Hail Caesar!" hits theaters Feb. 5, according to IMDB. Tony Hicks provides celebrity commentary for the Bay Area News Group. Follow him at twitter.com/tonyhicks67 . Advertisement
